A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a very controversial movie in the Star Wars community. A lot of the reasons are because people\, although they claimed not to want a copy cat of the original trilogy like episode 7 was; they could not stomach something different. Episode 8 was an original story\, it had its plot twists\, borrowed several things from the expanded universe (now called legends) like Leia using the force and Kylo Ren using subterfuge to claim leadership of the Fist Order (classic dark side master apprentice end of relationship that was never explored in the movies) and moved on from Anakin's story arc.
